headline: India’s growth to slow in 2026 but still strongest among major economies
summary: Investing.com -- India’s economy will likely slow in 2026 as punitive U.S. tariffs would weigh on exports, though it is positioned to remain the fastest growing major economy helped by robust domestic demand, low inflation and scope for more monetary easing.

content.title: India’s growth to slow in 2026 but still strongest among major economies
